channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Backpropagation is a leaky abstraction (2016)
item.description:
The forward and backward pass for a fully connected layer that uses ReLU would at the core include:z = np. z=0, it doesn’t “fire”), then its weights will get zero gradient. 40%) of your neurons were zero the entire time.

Read more

item.title: Notes by djb on using Fil-C (2025)
item.description:
There are also binary Fil-C packages, but I've worked primarily with the source package at this point. sh that builds many more libraries and applications (sometimes with patches from the Fil-C author). I didn't compile with debugging so Fil-C didn't say where this is in b2.

Read more

item.title: Why do AI models use so many em-dashes?
item.description:
Other people have argued that AI models use em-dashes because model training explicitly biases for brevity, and em-dashes are very token-efficient. Could em-dash use be RLHF-ed in from African English. 022% of them were em-dashes.

Read more
